DOC.brief_summary: The CoCa study with at maximum daily dose of 32 mg candesartan or 16/12.5 mg candesartan/hydrochlorothiazide has the objective to evaluate under naturalistic conditions, i.e. under routine medical care conditions, the subject compliance as well as the efficacy and tolerability of candesartan or candesartan/HCT in subjects suffering from essential hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Compliance of Patients With Essential Hypertension Treated With Candesartan or Candesartan/Hydrochlorothiazide
